doc.after: On Madonna's official website, it was reported that a music video was filmed in Milan, Italy, where "die-hard fans" showed up on July 18, 2009 for the filming of segments showcasing fans dancing and "being themselves."[37] A similar shoot took place later in Barcelona.[38] The video was directed by Jonas Ãkerlund, who worked with Madonna in her videos for "Ray of Light", "Music", "American Life" and "Jump".[6] The Guardian reported that Madonna's daughter Lourdes appeared in the video.[39] Madonna's official website, announced the premiere of the video to be on September 1, 2009. It was released simultaneously on music channels worldwide, and on iTunes.[40] The video was available for free download on iTunes until Thursday, when it then went up to purchase only. It was made as free download, so that buyers are made aware of the pre-order details of the Celebration album.[41]
